$interpreted: ???: Yaaaaagh---
Rookie Captain: What happened now!?
Soldier Guard: Captain!! Wendel escaped from the camp!! We were just about to go after him, but she held us back!
Jenna: Liars! You said the captain was punishing my brother, and you were fine with letting him work himself to death! You're all despicable!!
Rookie Captain: Enough with your nonsense!
Ace: Well, you must have your back up against the wall, don't you, to come into our barracks and accuse one of its captains?
Jenna: Oh? You're the noble I met at the diviner's! What are you doing here?
Sione: Diviner?
Ace: ………
Jenna: Since you are a noble, could you please send some soldiers out to find my brother? He's only just woken up, what if he runs into beasts?
Rookie Captain: What impudence, talking to Sir Aldric like that! Show some respect!
Rookie Captain: That boy ran away on his own accord! He'll get what he deserves!
Rookie Captain: Furthermore, your brother harassed Sir Aldric's very own sister! It's a testament to his kindness that Sir Ace didn't strike him down right then and there!
Nervous Guard: Whether Sir Ace is kind or not is none of your business!!
Rookie Captain: Sir Ace, I...
Jenna: Ace... Ace...
Jenna: Could it be that you're just like everyone else? You're here to teach my brother a lesson, and 'protect' your sister?
Ace: I'm sorry, I don't have time to answer your boring questions. I have business to take care of.
Jenna: That day you stepped up for me... I thought you were a good person. But I guess you're really just a bully, like all the other nobles!
Sione: Ah...
Rookie Captain: What arrogance... I'm shocked! I truly am!
Ace: It is true, helping you was not part of my initial plan. As such, I respect your decision to see my actions as just.
Ace: And yet, if you wish to believe baseless rumors, then I will do all in my power to clear my name.
Jenna: Ah...
Ace: Still... I do understand your urgency.
Ace: Time is a factor, so it may be best to find your brother and bring him back now. If you still wish to accuse me afterwards, do as you must.
Jenna: ...You're right.
Jenna: If my brother gets hurt out there, I'll never forgive any of you!
Sione: Uh oh, that way leads to a beast lair! We'll have to make haste.
Ace: And now is their mating season, so the beasts are quite riled up. You should wait here, I'll go with some of the other soldiers.
Sione: ...No, we should split up and look, it'll be quicker that way. Don't worry, brother, I can take care of myself.
Ace: ...Fine.
Ace: You better make sure my sister stays out of harm's way. If one of those beasts hurts a hair on her head, I swear...
Nervous Guard: Of course! We will keep her safe!!
Rookie Captain: If Wendel and his sister come back and try to report us, you all know what to do, right?
Ace: If anything happens to the two of them, you're going to have a lot of explaining to do.
Rookie Captain: Sir Ace, I... I...
Ace: (Since he just woke up after fainting, I doubt he could have run far.)
Ace: Smells like blood...
Ace: ---This isn't good.
Wendel: Give me back my pendant!
Beast: Grrruuooo~~~
Ace: Be more careful about where you're attacking! That's a sword, not a hammer!
Wendel: My pendant... Jenna gave me that when she was only six years old...
Wendel: I passed out and when I woke up, it was gone! I ran all the way here to find it... Now, I don't know how to thank you...
Wendel: Eh!? Why are there so many beasts!?
Ace: ...I'm not the only one who could smell the blood. You've pretty much rung their dinner bell.
Wendel: ...I'm sorry, I... I didn't know!
Ace: (How could Sione like this guy...)
Ace: (But if Sione has feelings for him, then I have to get him back safely...)

Model.Text: Yaaaaagh---
What happened now!?
Captain!! Wendel escaped from the camp!! We were just about to go after him, but she held us back!
Liars! You said the captain was punishing my brother, and you were fine with letting him work himself to death! You're all despicable!!
Enough with your nonsense!
Well, you must have your back up against the wall, don't you, to come into our barracks and accuse one of its captains?
Oh? You're the noble I met at the diviner's! What are you doing here?
Diviner?
Since you are a noble, could you please send some soldiers out to find my brother? He's only just woken up, what if he runs into beasts?
What impudence, talking to Sir Aldric like that! Show some respect!
That boy ran away on his own accord! He'll get what he deserves!
Furthermore, your brother harassed Sir Aldric's very own sister! It's a testament to his kindness that Sir Ace didn't strike him down right then and there!
Whether Sir Ace is kind or not is none of your business!!
Sir Ace, I...
Ace... Ace...
Could it be that you're just like everyone else? You're here to teach my brother a lesson, and 'protect' your sister?
I'm sorry, I don't have time to answer your boring questions. I have business to take care of.
That day you stepped up for me... I thought you were a good person. But I guess you're really just a bully, like all the other nobles!
Ah...
What arrogance... I'm shocked! I truly am!
It is true, helping you was not part of my initial plan. As such, I respect your decision to see my actions as just.
And yet, if you wish to believe baseless rumors, then I will do all in my power to clear my name.
Ah...
Still... I do understand your urgency.
Time is a factor, so it may be best to find your brother and bring him back now. If you still wish to accuse me afterwards, do as you must.
...You're right.
If my brother gets hurt out there, I'll never forgive any of you!
Uh oh, that way leads to a beast lair! We'll have to make haste.
And now is their mating season, so the beasts are quite riled up. You should wait here, I'll go with some of the other soldiers.
...No, we should split up and look, it'll be quicker that way. Don't worry, brother, I can take care of myself.
...Fine.
You better make sure my sister stays out of harm's way. If one of those beasts hurts a hair on her head, I swear...
Of course! We will keep her safe!!
If Wendel and his sister come back and try to report us, you all know what to do, right?
If anything happens to the two of them, you're going to have a lot of explaining to do.
Sir Ace, I... I...
(Since he just woke up after fainting, I doubt he could have run far.)
Smells like blood...
---This isn't good.
Give me back my pendant!
Grrruuooo~~~
Be more careful about where you're attacking! That's a sword, not a hammer!
My pendant... Jenna gave me that when she was only six years old...
I passed out and when I woke up, it was gone! I ran all the way here to find it... Now, I don't know how to thank you...
Eh!? Why are there so many beasts!?
...I'm not the only one who could smell the blood. You've pretty much rung their dinner bell.
...I'm sorry, I... I didn't know!
(How could Sione like this guy...)
(But if Sione has feelings for him, then I have to get him back safely...)
